It was accumulated for over a year. He sold his Bitcoin at the peak. Because Kraken wouldn’t let him withdraw fiat, he had to buy back in to try and move the coins to a legitimate exchange. Look what is happening to the price in the meantime.

He should have been allowed to withdraw $100K. When it didn’t work over and over again, Kraken said uhhh, try $37,500. When that didn’t work over and over again, Kraken said “You are welcome to withdraw using cryptocurrency.”
I don’t know yet. But what has happened to the value of Bitcoin in the meantime? My friend was forced to buy back in so that he could move the crypto.
